job_tasks.phrase: Als Drupal Developer bij Finalist werk je aan uitdagende en complexe websites en webapplicaties.
job_tasks.justification: This sentence describes the core software development activity of building websites and web applications.

job_tasks.phrase: Je realiseert doordachte en gebruiksvriendelijke webapplicaties.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly refers to the creation and realization of web applications, a fundamental software development task.
Working with a specific CMS/framework like Drupal falls under software development and integration.

job_tasks.phrase: schrikt niet terug van OO en MVC.
job_tasks.justification: Object-Oriented (OO) and Model-View-Controller (MVC) are core software development paradigms and architectural patterns.

job_tasks.phrase: Je draagt bij aan de toegankelijkheid van websites volgens de richtlijnen van Digitoegankelijkheid.
job_tasks.justification: Ensuring website accessibility is a part of the software development process, focusing on usability and compliance.

job_tasks.phrase: Je staat open voor moderne front-end frameworks zoals React en NextJS.
job_tasks.justification: Being open to and working with front-end frameworks like React and NextJS is a software development task.

soft_skills.phrase: Agile werken binnen een Scrum-team is voor jou geen probleem.
soft_skills.justification: Working within an Agile/Scrum team directly relates to collaboration and team-based work methodologies.

profile.rationale: The job advertisement focuses exclusively on traditional web development tasks using Drupal, OO, MVC, and front-end frameworks like React and NextJS. It mentions tools like Docker, Jenkins, and Git, which are standard software engineering tools. There is no mention of AI, ML, GenAI, LLMs, or related concepts in the responsibilities or required skills. Therefore, the role is classified as a 'Software Engineer'.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is very clear and specific about the technologies and tasks involved. There is no ambiguity or mention of AI/ML, making the classification straightforward.
